attributes.action: cease forcing us to pay the BBC licence fee and make the BBC earn its keep commercially
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has lost control of its senses. It pays it presenters too much, distorting the markets. It advertises its own services too freely. It panders to the lowest common denominator in its programmes, seeking ratings success. If a private broadcaster offered the appalling level of programmes and repeats that the BBC currently offer, I would not pay for its services. Why am I forced to do so for the BBC? No more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
